subject: Re: Need to test a method that returns void
msgSnippet: public void testCompressWithFileName(){ boolean result = true; try{ DataCompressionUtility.compress(smallFile); }catch(Exception ex){ result = false; }
messageBody:
public void testCompressWithFileName(){

boolean result = true;
try{
DataCompressionUtility.compress(smallFile);
}catch(Exception ex){
result = false;
}
Assert.assertTrue(result);
}
